solution.text:
We know \(\angle aob=\angle cob\) [alternate angles]
also, \(\angle abo = \angle ocd\) [vertically opposite angles]
So by AA similarity criteria, \(\bigtriangleup \) oba ~ \(\bigtriangleup \) ocd
\(\Rightarrow \frac {ob}{oc}=\frac {ab}{cd}=\frac 12\)
cd = _{{2*j}}_ is given
We have, \(ab=\frac {cd\times ob}{oc}=_{j}_\)

content.text:
In the given figure ab || cd and 2\(\times \) ob=oc
If cd=_{{2*j}}_cm, find the value of ab?
